arabicText: وَءَاخَرُونَ ٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ خَلَطُوا۟ عَمَلًۭا صَـٰلِحًۭا وَءَاخَرَ سَيِّئًا عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	 there	 are	 others	 who	 have	
acknowledged	 their	 sins	 and	 mixed	 a	
good	deed	with	another	that	was	bad;	it	is	
likely	 that	 Allah will	 accept	 their	
repentance;	indeed	Allah is	Oft	 Forgiving,	
Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 kuch	 aur	 haiñ	 jo	 apne	 gunāhoñ	 ke	
muqir	 (iqrāri)	 huwe	 aur	 milāyā	 ek	 kām	
acha	aur	doosrā	burā	qarib	hai	ki	Allāh	un	
ki	tauba	qabool	kare	beshak	Allāh	bakhsh	
ne	wālā	meharbān	hai

arabicText: خُذْ مِنْ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ صَدَقَةًۭ تُطَهِّرُهُمْ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنٌۭ لَّهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	be	upon	him)	take	the	obligatory	
charity	 from	 their	 wealth,	 by	 which	 you	
may	 cleanse	 them	 and	 make	 them	 pure,	
and	pray	in	their	favour;	indeed	your	prayer	is	the	contentment	of	their	hearts;	and	Allah is	All	
Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	 Mehboob!	 Un	 ke	 māl	 meiñ	 se	 zakāt	
tehsil	 (wusool)	 karo	 jis	 se	 tum	 unheñ	
suthrā	 aur	 pakiza	 kar	 do	 aur	 un	 ke	 haq	
meiñ	 Du’ā-e-khair	 karo	 beshak	 tumhāri	
du’ā	 un	 ke	 diloñ	 kā	 chain	 hai	 aur	 Allāh	
suntā	jāntā	hai.

arabicText: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ يَقْبَلُ ٱلتَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَأْخُذُ ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Do	they	not	know	that	Allah only	accepts	repentance	of	His	bondmen	and	He	takes	the	charity	*	
and	that	Allah only	is	the	Most	Acceptor	of	Repentance,	the	Most	Merciful?	(* into His control.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kyā	unheñ	khabar	nahiñ	ke	Allāh	hi	apne	bandoñ	ki	 taubā	qabool	kartā	aur	sadqe	khud	apne	
Dast-e-Mubarak	meiñ	leta	hai	aur	yeh	ki	Allāh	hi	taubā	qabool	karne	wālā	meharbān	hai

arabicText: وَقُلِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ فَسَيَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۖ وَسَتُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 say	 “Keep	 on	 with	 your	 works	 - Allah will	 now	 see	 your	 deeds,	 and	 so	 will	 His	 Noble	
Messenger	and	the	Muslims;	and	soon	you	will	return	to	the	One	Who	knows	everything	- the	
hidden	and	the	visible	- so	He	will	inform	you	of	what	you	used	to	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 tum	 farmāo	kām	karo	ab	 tumhāre	kām	dekhegā	Allāh	aur	uske	Rasool	aur	Musalmān	aur	
jald	us ki	taraf	paltoge	jo	chupā	aur	khulā	sab	jāntā	hai	to	woh	tumhāre	kām	tumheñ	jatā	degā.

arabicText: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرْجَوْنَ لِأَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا يُعَذِّبُهُمْ وَإِمَّا يَتُوبُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 some	 are	 kept	 waiting	 for	 Allah’s	 command	 - He	 may	 punish	 them	 or	 accept	 their	
repentance;	and	Allah is	All	Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 kuch	 mauqoof	 rakhe	 gaye	 haiñ	 Allāh	 ke	 hukm	 par	 yā	 un	 par	 ‘azāb	 kare	 yā	 un	 ki	 taubā	
qabool	kare	aur	Allāh	‘Ilm-o-Hikmat	wālā	hai.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مَسْجِدًۭا ضِرَارًۭا وَكُفْرًۭا وَتَفْرِيقًۢا بَيْنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَإِرْصَادًۭا لِّمَنْ حَارَبَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ وَلَيَحْلِفُنَّ إِنْ أَرَدْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	(hypocrites)	who	built	a	masjid
to	cause	harm,	and	due	to	disbelief,	and	in	
order	 to	 cause	 divisions	 among	 the	
Muslims,	 and	 to	 await	 the	 one	 who	 is	 at	
the	 outset	 an	 opponent	 of	 Allah and	 His	
Noble	 Messenger;	 and	 they	 will	 surely	
swear	 that	 “We	 wished	 only	 good”;	 and	
Allah is	witness	that	they	are	indeed	liars.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 woh	 jinhoñ	 ne	 Masjid	 banāi	 nuqsān	
pahuñchā	 ne	 ko	 aur	 kufr	 ke	 sabab	 aur	
Musalmānoñ	meiñ	tifarqā	dālne	ko	aur	us	
ke	intiżār	meiñ	jo	pehle	se	Allāh	aur	uske	
Rasool	 kā	 mukhālif	 hai	 aur	 woh	 zaroor	
qasmeñ	 khāyeñ	 ge	 ki	 hamne	 to	 bhalāi	 hi	
chāhi	aur	Allāh	gawāh	hai	ki	woh	beshak		
jhoote	haiñ.

arabicText: لَا تَقُمْ فِيهِ أَبَدًۭا ۚ لَّمَسْجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ مِنْ أَوَّلِ يَوْمٍ أَحَقُّ أَن تَقُومَ فِيهِ ۚ فِيهِ رِجَالٌۭ يُحِبُّونَ أَن يَتَطَهَّرُوا۟ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُطَّهِّرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Never	stand	(for	worship)	in	that	masjid *;	
indeed	 the	 masjid **	 that	 has	 been	
founded	 on	 piety	 from	 the	 very	 first	 day	
deserves	 that	you	should	stand	in	it;	in	it	
are	 the	 people	 who	 wish	 to	 thoroughly	
cleanse	 themselves;	 and	 Allah loves	 the	
clean.	(*The	masjid built	by	the	hypocrites.	
**	 The	 masjid at	 Quba,	 built	 by	 the	 Holy	
Prophet	 and	 his	 companions.	 The	merit	 of	
praying	2	Raka’	Nawafil	in	it	is	equal	to	the	
reward	of	an	Umrah.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	masjid	meiñ	tum	kabhi	khade	na	honā	
beshak	woh	Masjid	ke	pehle	hi	din	se	jis	ki	
bunyād	 parhezgāri	 par	 rakhi	gai	 hai	woh	
is	 qābil	 hai	 ke	 tum	 us	 meiñ	 khade ho	 us	
meiñ	woh	log	 haiñ	 ki	khoob	 suthrā	 honā	
chāhte	 haiñ	 aur	 suthre	 Allāh	 ko	 piyāre	
haiñ

arabicText: أَفَمَنْ أَسَّسَ بُنْيَـٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ تَقْوَىٰ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنٍ خَيْرٌ أَم مَّنْ أَسَّسَ بُنْيَـٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ شَفَا جُرُفٍ هَارٍۢ فَٱنْهَارَ بِهِۦ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	is	 one	who	 established	 his	 foundation	
upon	 the	 fear	 of	 Allah and	 upon	 His	
pleasure	 better,	 or	 the	 one	 who	 laid	 his	
foundation	 upon	 the	 brink	 of	 a	 falling	
precipice,	so	it	fell	along	with	him	into	the	
fire	of	hell?	And	Allah does	not	guide	 the	
unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. To	 kyā	 jis	 ne	 apni	 bunyād	 rakhi	 Allāh	 se	
dar	 aur	 us	 ki	 riza	 par	woh	 bhalā	 ya	woh	
jis	 ne	 apni	 niw	 chuni	 (bunyād	 rakhi)	 ek	
girāoo	 ghade	 ke	 kināre	 to	 woh	 use	 lekar	
jahannam	ki	āag	meiñ	deh	padā	aur	Allāh	żalimoñ	ko	rāh	nahiñ	detā

arabicText: لَا يَزَالُ بُنْيَـٰنُهُمُ ٱلَّذِى بَنَوْا۟ رِيبَةًۭ فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَّآ أَن تَقَطَّعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
. The	 building	 which	 they	 erected	 will	
constantly	keep	disturbing	 their	hearts	unless	 their	hearts	are	 torn	 to	pieces;	and	Allah is	All	
Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	t’amir	jo	chuni	hamesha	un	ke	diloñ	meiñ	khatakti	rahegi	magar	yeh	ki	un	ke	dil	ke	tukdetukde	ho	jāyeñ	aur	Allāh	Ilm-o-Hikmat	wālā	hai

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱشْتَرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلَهُم بِأَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۚ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقْتُلُونَ وَيُقْتَلُونَ ۖ وَعْدًا عَلَيْهِ حَقًّۭا فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ وَٱلْإِنجِيلِ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِعَهْدِهِۦ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَٱسْتَبْشِرُوا۟ بِبَيْعِكُمُ ٱلَّذِى بَايَعْتُم بِهِۦ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 Allah has	 purchased	 from	 the	 Muslims	 their	 lives	 and	 their	 wealth	 in	 exchange	 of	
Paradise	for	them;	fighting	in	Allah's	cause,	slaying	and	being	slain;	a	true	promise	incumbent	
upon	 His	 mercy,	 (mentioned)	 in	 the	 Taurat	 and	 the	 Injeel	 and	 the	 Qur’an;	 who	 fulfils	 His	
promise	better	than	Allah?	Therefore	rejoice	upon	your	deal	that	you	have	made	with	Him;	and	
this	is	the	great	success.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	Allāh	ne	Musalmānoñ	se	un	ke	māl	aur	jān	khareed liye	haiñ	is	badle	par	ke	un	ke	liye	
jannat	hai	Allāh	ki	rāh	meiñ	ladeñ	to	māreñ	aur	mareñ	us	ke	zimma-e-karam	par	sacha	w’adah	
tauret	aur	injil	aur	qurān	meiñ	aur	Allāh	se	ziyada	qaul	kā	poorā	kaun	to	khushiyāñ	manāo	apne	
saude	ki	jo	tum	ne	us	se	kiyā	hai	aur	yahi	badi	kāmyābi	hai.

arabicText: ٱلتَّـٰٓئِبُونَ ٱلْعَـٰبِدُونَ ٱلْحَـٰمِدُونَ ٱلسَّـٰٓئِحُونَ ٱلرَّٰكِعُونَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدُونَ ٱلْـَٔامِرُونَ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَٱلنَّاهُونَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَٱلْحَـٰفِظُونَ لِحُدُودِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 repent,	 those	 who	 worship,	
those	 who	 praise,	 those	 who	 fast,	 those	
who	bow,	those	who	prostrate,	those	who	
show	 right	 and	 forbid	 wrong	 and	 those	
who	keep	 the	limits	of	Allah in	sight;	and	
give	glad	tidings	to	the	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Taubā	 wale	 Ibādat	 wale	 sarāhne	 wāle	
Roze	wāle	ruku’	wāle	sajde	wāle	bhalai	ke	
batāne	wāle	burāi	se	rokne	wāle	aur	Allāh	
ki	 hadeñ	 nigāh	 rakhne	 wāle	 aur	 khushi	
sunāo	Musalmānoñ	ko

arabicText: مَا كَانَ لِلنَّبِىِّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَن يَسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَلَوْ كَانُوٓا۟ أُو۟لِى قُرْبَىٰ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمْ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
. It	 does	 not	 befit	 the	 Prophet	 and	 those	
who	believe,	to	pray	for	the	forgiveness	of	
polytheists	 even	 if	 they	 may	 be	 their	
relatives,	after	it	has	become	clear	to	them	
that	they	are	the	people	of	hell.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Nabi	 aur	 Imān	 wāloñ	 ko	 lāiq	 nahi	 ki	
mushrikoñ	 ki	 bakhshish	 chāheiñ	 agarche	
woh	 rishte	 dār	 hoñ	 jab	 ke	 unheñ	 khul	
chuke	ke	woh	dozakhi	haiñ

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ ٱسْتِغْفَارُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ إِلَّا عَن مَّوْعِدَةٍۢ وَعَدَهَآ إِيَّاهُ فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥٓ أَنَّهُۥ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنْهُ ۚ إِنَّ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ لَأَوَّٰهٌ حَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 seeking	 of	 forgiveness	 for	 his	
father	 (paternal	 uncle)	 by	 Ibrahim	 was	
only	because	of	a	promise	he	had	made	to	
him;	 then	 when	 it	 became	 clear	 to	 him	
that	 he	 was	 an	 enemy	 of	 Allah,	 Ibrahim	
broke	off	ties	with	him;	indeed	Ibrahim	is	
surely	very	soft-hearted,	most	forbearing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 Ibrāheem ka	 apne	 bāp	 ki	 bakhshish	
chāhna	woh	 to	na	 thā	magar	ek	w’ade	ke	
sabab	 jo	 in	 se	 kar	 chuka	 thā	 phir	 jab	
Ibrāheem	 ko	 khul	 gaya	 ki	 woh	 Allāh	 ka	
dushman	 hai	 us	 se	 tinka	 tod	 diyā	 (lā	
ťalluq	 ho	 gayā)	 beshak	 Ibrāheem zarur	
āheñ	karne	wālā	mutahammil	hai

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَوْمًۢا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَىٰهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَهُم مَّا يَتَّقُونَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	 it	 does	 not	 befit	 Allah’s	 Majesty	 to	
send	 a	 nation	 astray	 after	 He	 has	 guided	
them	 until	 He	 has	 made	 clear	 to	 them	
what	 they	 should	 avoid;	 indeed	 Allah
knows	everything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allāh	ki	shān	nahi	ke	kisi	qaum	ko	hidāyat	karke	gumrāh	farmāye	jab	tak	unheiñ	sāf	na	batā	
de	ke	kis	chiz	se	unheiñ	bachnā	chahiye	beshak	Allāh	sab	kuch	jāntā	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۚ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 for	Allah only	is	 the	kingship	of	 the	heavens	and	 the	earth;	He	gives	life	and	He	gives	
death;	and	other	than	Allah,	you	have	neither	a	Protector	nor	any	Supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	Allāh	hi	ke	liye	hai	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ki	saltanat	jilātā	aur	mārtā	hai	aur	Allāh	ke	
siwā	na	tumhārā	koi	wāli	na	madadgār

arabicText: لَّقَد تَّابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِىِّ وَٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ وَٱلْأَنصَارِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ فِى سَاعَةِ ٱلْعُسْرَةِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا كَادَ يَزِيغُ قُلُوبُ فَرِيقٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِهِمْ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 Allah’s	 mercy	 inclined	 towards	 the	 Herald	 of	 the	 Hidden,	 and	 the	 Muhajirs	 and	 the	
Ansar	who	stood	by	him	in	 the	 time	of	hardship,	after	it	was	likely	 that	 the	hearts	of	a	group	
among	them	would	turn	away	- He	then	inclined	towards	them	with	mercy;	indeed	He	is	Most	
Compassionate,	Most	Merciful	upon	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	Allāh	ki	Rahmateiñ	mutawajjeh	huwiñ	un	ghaib	ki	khabreiñ	batāne	wāle	(Nabi)	aur	un	
muhājirin	aur	ansār	par	jinhoñ	ne	mushkil	ki	ghari	meiñ	unka	sāth	diya	bad	us	ke	ki	qarib	thā	ki	
un	meiñ	kuch	logoñ	ke	dil	phir	jāyeiñ	phir	un	par	rahmat	se	mutawajjeh	huwa	hai	beshak	woh	
un	par	nihāyat	meharbān	raham	wālā	hai.

arabicText: وَعَلَى ٱلثَّلَـٰثَةِ ٱلَّذِينَ خُلِّفُوا۟ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ضَاقَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتْ وَضَاقَتْ عَلَيْهِمْ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَن لَّا مَلْجَأَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّآ إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ تَابَ عَلَيْهِمْ لِيَتُوبُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
And	also	upon	the	three	who	were	kept	in	
waiting;	when	 the	earth,	vast	as	it	is,	was	
restricted	 for	 them,	 and	 they	 became	
weary	 of	 their	 own	 lives	 and	 became	
certain	 that	 there	is	no	refuge	 from	Allah
except	 with	 Him;	 He	 then	 accepted	 their	
repentance in	 order	 that	 they	 remain	
repentant;	 indeed	 Allah is	 the	 Most	
Acceptor	 of	 Repentance,	 the	 Most	
Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 un	 teen	 par	 jo	 mauqoof	 rakhe	 gaye	
the	 yahañ	 tak	 ke	 jab	 zameen	 itni	 wase’e	
ho	 kar un	 par	 tang	 ho	gayi	aur	woh	apni	
jān	se	tang	āaye	aur	unheiñ	yaqeen	hua	ke	
Allāh	 se	 panāh	 nahiñ	 magar	 usi	 ke	 pās	
phir	un	ki	 tauba	qabool	ki, ke	 tāib	raheiñ	
beshak	Allāh	 hi	 taubā	 qubool	 karne	wālā	
meharbān	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. O	People	who	Believe!	Fear	Allah,	and	be	
with	the	truthful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	 Imān	 wālo!	 Allāh	 se	 daro	 aur	
sachchoñ	ke	sath	ho.

arabicText: مَا كَانَ لِأَهْلِ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ أَن يَتَخَلَّفُوا۟ عَن رَّسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَرْغَبُوا۟ بِأَنفُسِهِمْ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ لَا يُصِيبُهُمْ ظَمَأٌۭ وَلَا نَصَبٌۭ وَلَا مَخْمَصَةٌۭ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَطَـُٔونَ مَوْطِئًۭا يَغِيظُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ وَلَا يَنَالُونَ مِنْ عَدُوٍّۢ نَّيْلًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عَمَلٌۭ صَـٰلِحٌ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
It	did	not	befit	the	people	of	Medinah	and	
the	people	of	the	villages	around	them,	to	
stay	behind	the	Noble	Messenger	of	Allah,	
nor	 to	 consider	 their	 own	 lives	 dearer	
than	 his	life;	 that	is	 because	 the	 thirst	 or	
the	pain	or	the	hunger	that	afflicts	them	in	
Allah's	cause,	and	the	step	they	tread	on	a	
place	 that	 angers	 the	 disbelievers,	 and	
whatever harm	 they	 cause	 the	enemy	- a	
good	deed	is	recorded	 for	 them	in	lieu	of	
all	 of	 these;	 indeed	Allah does	 not	 waste	
the	wages	of	the	virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Madine wāloñ	aur	un	ke	gird	dehāt	wāloñ	
ko	 lāiq	 na	 thā	 ke	 Rasool-Ullāh se	 piche	
baith	 raheiñ	 aur	 na	 yeh	 ki	 un	 ki	 jān	 se	
apni	 jān	 piyāri	 samjheiñ	 yeh	 isliye	 ki	
unheiñ	jo	piyās	ya	taklif	ya	bhook	Allāh	ki	
rāh	 meiñ	 pahuñchti	 hai	 aur	 jahān	 aeysi	
jagah	qadam	rakhte	haiñ	jis	se	kāfiroñ	ko	
ghaiz	(ghussa)	āye	aur	jo	kuch	kisi	dushman	ka	bigādte	haiñ	is	sab	ke	badle	un	ke	liye	nek	ámal	
likha	jāta	hai	beshak	Allāh	nekoñ	ka	neg	(ajar-o-inaām)	zā’i	nahi	karta
